subject: Philosophy
title: The Koan
description: A quick win: understand The Koan.

hook.text: What is the sound of one hand clapping? There's no logical answer. That's the point.

buildup.text: A koan is a paradoxical riddle given to Zen students to break the habit of rational thinking.

discovery.text: You can't solve it with logic. The koan forces your mind to leap beyond concepts.

twist.text: When you exhaust all logical answers, something else opens up â€” a direct seeing beyond words.

climax.text: Koans have been used for over a thousand years. The confusion is the medicine.

punchline.text: The answer arrives when you stop looking.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of a Zen koan?
